INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: In this paper, we described an update and extension of a systematic review about organizational motivations for adopting CMMI-based Software Process Improvement (SPI). We applied the systematic review method to search, select, evaluate, and synthesize the published research related to this topic. We then compared our findings to those of another systematic review previously published. Our findings showed that the motivations to engaged on CMMI-based SPI changed from being related to software quality to focusing on complying with customers? requirements and satisfaction, as well to conquer external validation.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In this paper, we described an update and extension of a systematic review about organizational motivations for adopting CMMI-based Software Process Improvement (SPI). Our findings showed that the motivations to engaged on CMMI-based SPI changed from being related to software quality to focusing on complying with customers? requirements and satisfaction, as well to conquer external validation.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This article presents the result of a comparative analysis performed in three agile maturity models. The analysis was structured in two views, the first is to a macroscopic view that shows the general data of each model, and then you will see a more detailed view of a level by level comparison, where it has been about a Quantitative Analysis of process areas and practices recommended by these models. We believe that the present results provide guidelines for organizations to identify the effort associated with implementing these models.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Administrao pblica, defesa e seguridade social
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Pesquisa e desenvolvimento cientfico

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Context: Competitiveness is the key to a sustainable development and it demands agility at the business and organizational levels, which in turn requires a flexible and customizable Information Technology (IT) environment, as well as effective and responsive governance in order to deliver value faster, better, and cheaper to the business. Objective: This paper describes the ongoing research design we conduct to analyze and understand better this context, and whose expected result will be a theory of agile governance to help researchers and practitioners apply agile capabilities on governance issues in order to achieve organizational performance and business competitiveness. Method: We conducted a systematic literature review on the state of the art of agile governance, together with a meta-ethnography study on professional social networks related to governance, and we are applying the phenomenology and grounded theory approaches to the collected data. Results: We have identified 16 emerging categories, organized into four major thematic groups, based on the patterns identified in the collected data. As a result, we could offer a convergent definition for agile governance, six meta-principles, and a map of findings organized by topic and classified by relevance and convergence, detailed in other paper under publishing process. Conclusion: We found evidence that indicates agile governance as a relatively new, wide and multidisciplinary area focused on organizational performance and competitiveness that needs to be more intensively studied and might have its boundaries better defined. We are currently making improvements and additions to the methodological approach for exploratory qualitative studies.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Administrao pblica, defesa e seguridade social
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Pesquisa e desenvolvimento cientfico

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Context: Agility at the business and organizational levels presents a challenge for many enterprises. Business agility demands the ability to sense and respond to changes in competitive environments, whereas organizational agility demands the dexterity to sense broader market opportunities and respond with changes that are organization-wide. These challenges require an information and communication technologies (IT) environment flexible and customizable simultaneously with the coordination across multiple organization units, also demands effective and responsive governance in order to deliver value faster, better, and cheaper to the business. Objective: This presentation introduces an agile framework called MAnGve, as an alternative to implement and improve governance processes and service management on an agile lifecycle. In addition, we describe the MAnGve?s application in the context of the Brazilian government. Method: Adopting an in-depth case study approach, we privileged the participant observation in which the research is conducted within the company itself, and where the status of the researcher is not highlighted. The case study was based on observation, interviews with the different actors of the company, as well as by the metrics generated by the results achieved upon the application of the framework. Results: After only two tides (complete lifecycle of the framework), along eight months, the involved team had been capable to implemented three governance processes and one service management function (service desk). At the same time, the team evolved from an operation based on "firefighting" to a maturity stage, where they are able to express their initiatives in terms of service management. Conclusion: Indeed, the framework's application generated a set of positive and concrete evidences, such as: i) guiding the team: ?where to begin??, ?how to adapt??, and ?what to prioritize??; ii) reducing the costs, timing and external dependencies. Those evidences l

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Agility at the business and organizational levels presents a challenge for many enterprises. Business agility demands the ability to sense and respond to changes in competitive environments, whereas organizational agility demands the dexterity to sense broader market opportunities and respond with changes that are organization-wide. These challenges require an information and communication technologies (ICT or IT) environment flexible and customizable simultaneously with the coordination across multiple organization units, also demands effective and responsive governance in order to deliver faster, better, and cheaper value to the business. Driven by these challenges, the goals of the candidate?s PhD thesis is to conceive, define, and evaluate a management model for agile governance on global development environments. Preliminary insights suggest the model?s format should be a corporative game, applying constructs of gamification, fun theory and game theory, generating a practical approach to facilitate the implementation of a collaborative and adaptive culture, in order to establish relational integration mechanisms as well as a better understanding of how these arrangements can help the organizations to attain greater enterprise agility and support its overall strategy.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Agile Governance Theory: conceptual development

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 12th International Conference on Management of Technology and Information Systems
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: 12th CONTECSI

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Alexandre Jos Henrique de Oliveira Luna

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Context: Competitiveness is the key to a sustainable development and it demands agility at the business and organizational levels, which in turn requires a flexible and customizable IT environment and effective and responsive governance in order to deliver value to the business. Objective: This paper describes the conceptual development of a theory for analyze and describe agile governance in order to increasing the success rate of their practice, achieving organizational performance and business competitiveness. Method: We adopt a multi-method research, framing the theory conceptual development using Dubin's method of theory building. Results: We have developed a conceptual framework of the theory encompassing its constructs, laws of interaction, boundaries and system states. Conclusion: This theory can provide a better understanding of the essence of agile governance, by mapping of its constructs, mediators, moderators and disturbing factors, in order to help organizations reach better results.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Reflecting, adapting and learning in small software organizations: an action research approach

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: The 27th International Conference on Software Engineering and Knowledge Engineering

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Alexandre Jos Henrique de Oliveira Luna

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Software Engineering activities are context based and carried out by people, within its culture and project actuality. Consequently, it demands a great deal of social relations. In order to better understanding these challenges faced by software development projects, we have had to go beyond the actual mindset, literature and bodies of knowledge. This paper is a result of an empirical research, aligned with evidence-based Software Engineering, about studies conducted on five software development Micro and Small Enterprises in Brazil, during 22 months, between July-2012 and May-2014. We have adopted a participant observer ethnographic study, resulting in intervention based on action research. The interventions happened several times, leading into continuous and constructive process of reflecting and learning. As a result, we have observed the emergence of a practical problem solving culture, from a collaborative immediate situation, which expanding the actor?s competencies in every cycle of its execution. Although every organization had its own major problem to be dealt with, our findings point out to some common problems and emerging action strategies to handle with these challenges.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Administrao pblica, defesa e seguridade social
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Atividades de prestao de servios de informao

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Context: People are a key element of change in organizations and its driving force. The need to understand people as an essential and creative component of the structures and processes is a critical success factor for governance initiatives. Objective: Inspired by the Manifesto for Agile Software Development, this paper proposes the Agile Governance Manifesto as a behavioral reference for individuals and teams in order to help implement agile governance in organizations. Method: This proposal emerges as an inductive and structuralist look over the findings from a broad research developed to describe and analyze the agile governance phenomena, supported by several complementary studies: systematic literature review, observation and interaction of professional groups based on social networks, semi structured interviews, and explanatory survey with representative agents of the phenomena under study. Results: We characterize the agile governance phenomena with six meta-principles and nine meta-values are discussed in order to guide future researches and especially to drive practices on agile governance. Conclusion: This proposal is to be used as an instrument to build an appreciative and positive organizational culture in order to pave the way for smoother and gradual adoption of agile governance.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Context: With increasing business complexities, globalization and rapid changes in technology and business environments the governance is the keystone for organizations ensure the return of investments, as well organizational competitiveness and sustainability. Objective: This paper describes the research proposal that seeks to establish instruments to facilitate the development of sense and respond capabilities, by teams and organizations, adopting mechanisms that promote the people engagement. Method: Seeking to reach these aims, we developed a research framework, combining the following methodological approaches: Systematic Literature Review, Exploratory Literature Review, Design Science, Action Research and Quasi-experiment. Expected Results: As a result, we plan to develop a Corporate Game Design (CGD) embedding Agile Governance Theory, seeking to facilitate its application in organizations and attempting to reach a trustworthy theory.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Context: With increasing business complexities, globalization and rapid changes in technology and business environments the governance is the keystone for organizations ensure the return of investments, as well organizational competitiveness and sustainability. Objective: This paper describes the research proposal that seeks to establish instruments to facilitate the development of sense and respond capabilities, by teams and organizations, adopting mechanisms that promote the people engagement. Method: Seeking to reach these aims, we developed a research framework, combining the following methodological approaches: Systematic Literature Review, Exploratory Literature Review, Design Science, Action Research and Quasi-experiment. Expected Results: As a result, we plan to develop a Corporate Game Design (CGD) embedding Agile Governance Theory, seeking to facilitate its application in organizations and attempting to reach a trustworthy theory.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Outras atividades profissionais, cientficas e tcnicas
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-3: Atividades de sedes de empresas e de consultoria em gesto empresarial

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O presente trabalho apresenta um estudo de caso sobre a implantao do Framework de Governana
gil MAnGve em uma organizao pblica localizada em Recife, Pernambuco. A finalidade deste projeto explicitar a efetividade do MAnGve num ambiente inicialmente problemtico e mal organizado, relatando atravs de sua metodologia prtica todas as etapas realizadas durante o processo de implantao. Sero relatados todos os procedimentos realizados durante um perodo de cerca de dois meses, elencando os principais problemas encontrados e analisando todas as entregas de valores e mudanas positivas alcanadas pela organizao no que tange a sua gesto e uso de ativos de TIC.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This work presents a case study on the implementation of the MAnGve Framework in a public organization located in Recife, Pernambuco. The purpose of this project is to make explicit the effectiveness of MAnGve in an initially problematic and poorly organized environment, reporting through its practical methodology all the steps taken during the implementation process of Agile ICT Governance. All the procedures performed during a period about two months will be reported, selecting the main problems encountered and analyzing all de- liveries of values acquired by the organization in its management and use of ICT assets.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Administrao pblica, defesa e seguridade social
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Servios de escritrio, de apoio administrativo e outros servios prestados s empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A adoo do ensino remoto provocou uma significativa reavaliao da interao docente-discente, em funo das regras de distanciamento social implementadas por ocasio da pandemia da Covid-19. Essa transio motivou a adoo de abordagens e tcnicas visando garantir a participao dos estudantes nas atividades remotas, seu engajamento, bom rendimento acadmico e evitar evaso. Buscando apresentar resposta satisfatria classe de problemas que emerge deste contexto, foram desenvolvidos e avaliados artefatos para auxiliar no processo de ensino-aprendizagem utilizando aprendizagem ativa e elementos de jogos, visando estimular os alunos a participarem ativamente, como protagonistas de seu aprendizado. Conduziu-se uma pesquisa de mtodos mistos, ancorada pela abordagem Design Science Research, onde os artefatos foram sistematizados em um jogo colaborativo. Os artefatos produzidos foram aplicados e avaliados no contexto pedaggico de sala de aula invertida, numa disciplina da graduao de Administrao da UFPE no semestre 2020.3, apresentando resultados encorajadores no estmulo aos alunos, na participao, engajamento, e rendimento acadmico. Os resultados demonstraram que os participantes conseguiram aplicar o MASTER-PM com esforo considerado adequado, mitigando obstculos ligados classe de problema que motivou a pesquisa, e produzindo repercusses positivas no aprendizado da turma. O feedback dos alunos permitiu o aperfeioamento do jogo e seus artefatos.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The adoption of remote teaching led to a significant reassessment of teacher-student interaction due to the social distancing rules implemented during the Covid-19 pandemic. This transition motivated the adoption of approaches and techniques to ensure student participation in remote activities, engagement, good academic performance, and avoiding dropout. Seeking to present a satisfactory answer to the class of problems that emerges from this context, artifacts were developed and evaluated to assist in the teaching-learning process using active learning and game elements, aiming to encourage students to participate as protagonists of their learning process actively. We conducted mixed methods research anchored by the Design Science Research approach, where the artifacts were systematized in a collaborative game. The artifacts produced were applied and evaluated in the pedagogical context of an inverted classroom, in a discipline of the undergraduate Business Administration at UFPE in semester 2020.3, showing encouraging results in stimulating students' participation, engagement, and academic performance. The results showed that the participants could apply the MASTER-PM with an effort considered adequate, mitigating obstacles linked to the class of problem that motivated the research and producing positive repercussions on the learning of the students. The feedback from the students allowed the game's improvement and its artifacts.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Servios de escritrio, de apoio administrativo e outros servios prestados s empresas
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-3: Atividades de ateno sade humana

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O mundo experimenta, a partir de 2020, um desafio global sem precedentes nos ltimos 100 anos, causado pela pandemia da Covid-19, transformando a vida das pessoas e como as organizaes funcionam em um curto espao de tempo. Diante desse cenrio, um acordo de cooperao tcnica foi celebrado para o estabelecimento de uma rede de colaborao intersetorial visando o enfrentamento da pandemia e de suas consequncias sociais e econmicas. Este artigo relata o design de um framework de governana e gesto para um Centro para Inovao Digital em Sade, e sua consequente avaliao por meio da sua operao inicial. As sistemticas e mecanismos de governana e gesto desenvolvidos foram projetados e avaliados por uma pesquisa de mtodos mistos, ancorada pela abordagem de Design Science Research. So relatados os elementos do framework elaborado e ilustrados alguns artefatos resultantes deste perodo inicial de sua operao. Os resultados obtidos na aplicao do framework para apoio operao do Centro demonstraram-se promissores. Embora os resultados no possam ser generalizados, razovel esperar que a aplicao do framework em contextos semelhantes, para governana e gesto em ecossistemas de CT&I, possa obter resultados anlogos.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The world experienced, from 2020, a global challenge unprecedented in the last 100 years, caused by the Covid-19 pandemic, transforming people's lives and how organizations work in a short time. Given this scenario, a technical cooperation agreement was signed for the establishment of an intersectoral collaboration network aimed at confronting the pandemic and its social and economic consequences. This article reports the design of a governance and management framework for a Center for Digital Innovation in Health and its consequent evaluation through its initial operation. The governance and management systems and mechanisms developed were designed and evaluated by a mixed methods research anchored by the Design Science Research approach. The elements of the elaborated framework are reported, and some artifacts resulting from this initial period of operation are illustrated. The results obtained in the application of the framework to support the operation of the Center proved to be promising. Although the results cannot be generalized, it is reasonable to expect that applying the framework in similar contexts, for governance and management in ST&I ecosystems, can obtain similar results.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Administrao pblica, defesa e seguridade social
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Servios de escritrio, de apoio administrativo e outros servios prestados s empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The success of organizations relies increasingly on professionals who can quickly adapt to changes in their environment. According to a report from the Project Management Institute (PMI) published in 2021, there will be a 25 million project professionals shortage by 2030. In this context, it is reasonable to consider that developing more efficient and engaging ways to the Management Learning process is a relevant contribution to the Management Sciences, industry, and society. Recognizing serious games as an effective approach to achieving these goals, we developed and evaluated a digital Business-Simulation Game (BSG) on governance and project management. We chose the Construct 3 (C3) game engine to build the game, considering its visual programming environment as an advantage to accelerate the research team's learning curve. However, as development progressed, we faced software scalability issues, which we identified as being caused by insufficient support for object-oriented programming (OOP) in the platform. We mitigated this problem by developing a framework for emulating OOP in C3 (FEOOP-C3), applied in constructing the BSG. The results demonstrated that the team could apply FEOOP-C3 with adequate effort, mitigating obstacles related to the BSG scalability and producing agility and flexibility in the development and maintenance of the software.

In this context, it is reasonable to consider that developing more efficient and engaging ways to the Management Learning process is a relevant contribution to the Management Sciences, industry, and society. Recognizing serious games as an effective approach to achieving these goals, we developed and evaluated a digital Business-Simulation Game (BSG) on governance and project management. The results demonstrated that the team could apply FEOOP-C3 with adequate effort, mitigating obstacles related to the BSG scalability and producing agility and flexibility in the development and maintenance of the software.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Administrao pblica, defesa e seguridade social
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Servios de escritrio, de apoio administrativo e outros servios prestados s empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Transformaes tecnolgicas e culturais nos contextos organizacionais tm estimulado a busca por profissionais com habilidades em gerenciamento de projetos e a capacidade de reconhecer, adaptar e responder s mudanas em seus ambientes. Por esta razo, apresenta-se como contribuio relevante a produo de novas formas de experimentar, tomar decises e agir no contexto da gesto de projetos, que possam auxiliar profissionais em formao (estudantes) ou praticantes a desenvolver competncias tcnicas e comportamentais nessa temtica. O uso de Serious Games no contexto de Business Simulation Game (BSG) destaca-se como uma abordagem efetiva para aprimorar o engajamento no processo de aprendizagem gerencial. O presente trabalho relata o desenvolvimento e a avaliao inicial de um BSG voltado aprendizagem em governana e gerenciamento de projetos. O jogo srio digital foi avaliado por 16 participantes sob os critrios de usabilidade, viabilidade e utilidade, com a utilizao de questionrios antes e aps a experincia de jogo, que auxiliaram no entendimento dos diferentes perfis de jogadores, registrando suas percepes sobre o game, e apontando pontos ajuste e melhoria. De uma forma geral, esse estudo piloto foi muito importante para a preparao do estgio seguinte da pesquisa por meio da realizao de um experimento controlado com estudantes.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Technological and cultural transformations in organizational contexts have stimulated the search for professionals with project management skills and the ability to recognize, adapt and respond to changes in their environments. For this reason, producing new ways of experimenting, making decisions, and acting in the context of project management is a relevant contribution that can help professionals in training (students) or practitioners to develop technical and behavioral skills in this area. Serious Games in the context of a Business Simulation Game (BSG) stands out as an effective approach to improve engagement in the managerial learning process. The present work reports the development and initial evaluation of a BSG focused on learning in governance and project management. The digital serious game was evaluated by 16 participants under the criteria of usability, viability, and usefulness, with the use of questionnaires before and after the game experience, which helped in understanding the different profiles of players, recording their perceptions about the game, and pointing out adjustment and improvement points. In general, this pilot study was very important for preparing for the next research stage by conducting a controlled experiment with students.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Servios de escritrio, de apoio administrativo e outros servios prestados s empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Engagement in teamwork is a critical success factor in software development teams, where collaboration and communication are paramount. Research consistently highlights the positive impact of high engagement on a team's overall performance and project outcomes. However, we are still missing an in-depth understanding of how engagement occurs in teamwork. In this study we used design science as an approach to observe new multicultural agile teams for four months, collect data through interviews, a survey and observations, and develop a framework of the factors that impact engagement in teamwork. Our research aims to help teams understand how the engagement in teamwork occurs in multicultural agile teams to deal with the multicultural aspects and towards improved team performance.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Engagement in teamwork is a critical success factor in software development teams, where collaboration and communication are paramount. Our research aims to help teams understand how the engagement in teamwork occurs in multicultural agile teams to deal with the multicultural aspects and towards improved team performance.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Administrao pblica, defesa e seguridade social
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Servios de escritrio, de apoio administrativo e outros servios prestados s empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Context: The project management classroom often relies on theoretical teaching methods. However, a gap exists between the demand for skilled project managers and the ability of traditional education to fully prepare students. 
Problem: One of the primary challenges in project management education is maintaining student engagement. Traditional methods may not be sufficient to capture and sustain students' interest.
Solution: serious games emerge as a promising solution to enhance engagement and knowledge retention in various learning contexts. In this study, we evaluated a serious game in project management to improve both the tool and the students' experience.
IS Theory: The theory of organizational learning proposes that organizations can learn and adapt. Serious games in project management align with this theory by providing simulated environments for collaborative learning and practical experience.
Method: The study utilizes a mixed-methods approach, combining quantitative and qualitative data collection techniques to evaluate a serious game by a group of project management students. 
Summarization of Results: The study found that the serious game was effective in engaging students and enhancing their understanding of project management concepts. Students reported positive experiences with the game, highlighting its ability to simulate real-world scenarios. The game also demonstrated potential for improving knowledge retention and practical skill development.
Contributions and Impact on IS: The study contributes to the field of information systems by providing empirical evidence for the effectiveness of serious games in project management through the perception of immersion and presence, the study can inform future research and practice in the field.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Administrao pblica, defesa e seguridade social
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Servios de escritrio, de apoio administrativo e outros servios prestados s empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este projeto desenvolveu e avaliou um Business Simulation Game (BSG) intitulado MASTER-PM, aplicado ao ensino de Governana e Gerenciamento de Projetos. Utilizando a abordagem de Design Science Research (DSR), o projeto integrou reviso da literatura, entrevistas com profissionais e testes empricos com estudantes. No experimento controlado, o BSG demonstrou maior reteno de conhecimento (T3: 7,69 2,10), enquanto o ensino baseado em casos destacou-se na aplicao imediata do conhecimento (T2: 6,75 2,22). Em relao ao engajamento, o grupo do BSG apresentou aumento mdio (5,61 1,45 para 5,98 1,40), enquanto o grupo do caso de ensino teve uma leve reduo (5,45 1,75 para 5,33 2,19). Os resultados reforam o potencial dos jogos srios em promover aprendizagem ativa e engajamento no processo de aprendizagem, enquanto mtodos estruturados oferecem eficcia imediata. Os estudantes demostraram-se engajados e empolgados durante a avaliao das estratgias de ensino utilizadas no estudo. O projeto gerou artigos publicados e produtos registrados, ampliando as contribuies acadmicas e tecnolgicas. O projeto tambm contribuiu para atender aos Objetivos de Desenvolvimento Sustentvel (ODS) da ONU, relacionados educao de qualidade (4), crescimento econmico (8) e inovao (9). Os aprendizados e desdobramentos deste projeto vm sendo aplicados e refinados para aprimorar o ensino de graduao na UFPE nos semestres letivos subsequentes.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
This project developed and evaluated a Business Simulation Game (BSG) titled MASTER-PM, applied to teaching Governance and Project Management. Using the Design Science Research (DSR) approach, the project integrated a literature review, interviews with professionals, and empirical testing with students.

In the controlled experiment, the BSG demonstrated higher knowledge retention (T3: 7.69 2.10), while case-based teaching excelled in immediate knowledge application (T2: 6.75 2.22). Regarding engagement, the BSG group showed an average increase (5.61 1.45 to 5.98 1.40), whereas the case-based learning group experienced a slight decline (5.45 1.75 to 5.33 2.19).

The results reinforce the potential of serious games in fostering active learning and engagement, while structured methods provide immediate effectiveness. Students displayed high levels of engagement and enthusiasm during the evaluation of the teaching strategies used in the study.

The project resulted in published articles and registered products, expanding its academic and technological contributions. It also contributed to the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), specifically Quality Education (4), Economic Growth (8), and Innovation (9). The insights and outcomes from this project continue to be applied and refined to enhance undergraduate education at UFPE in subsequent semesters.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Finalista do 14 Prmio CONIP de Excelncia e Inovao na Gesto Pblica. Centro de Convenes Sul Amrica. Rio de Janeiro - RJ
-------------------
Este artigo apresenta um relato sinttico sobre a aplicao do MAnGve (pronuncia-se mangue), um framework gil para implantao de Governana gil, na Gerncia de Infraestrutura de Tecnologia da Informao da Secretaria de Educao de Pernambuco. So apresentados os fundamentos do framework, o contexto organizacional vivenciado, os principais obstculos e limitaes e as adequaes realizadas. Ao final so discutidos os principais resultados alcanados, perspectivas e trabalhos futuros
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents a summary report on the implementation of MAnGve, a framework for deploying agile Agile Governance in Infrastructure Management, Information Technology, Department of Education of Pernambuco. We present the fundamentals of the framework, the organizational context experienced, the main obstacles and limitations and adjustments made. At the end we discuss the major achievements, prospects and future work

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: The effect of ultrasonic waves in conducting polymer solution
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: The effect of ultrasonic waves in conducting polymer solution

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Alexandre Jos Henrique de Oliveira Luna

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Desenvolvimento de Novos Materiais

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The effects of ultrasonic wave on the conducting polymer polyaniline dissolved in DMSO were observed. The UV?visible, infrared and NMR analysis show that the polymer undergo a redox and doping transition when the ultrasound wave interacts with the polymer dissolved into the solvent. The proposed mechanism to explain these effects is based on the solvents hygroscopicity properties. The interaction with the ultrasonic wave, homolitically dissociates the water molecule producing radical species, and these species interact with the dissolved conducting polymer changing its oxidation and doped state. The resulting effects of that interaction are the modification of oxidation state of the conducting polymer and the decrease of the amount of water molecule in the solvent. From those results, we have proposed one straightforward method to eliminate water contamination in the solvent DMSO using ultrasonic waves.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The effects of ultrasonic wave on the conducting polymer polyaniline dissolved in DMSO were observed. The UV?visible, infrared and NMR analysis show that the polymer undergo a redox and doping transition when the ultrasound wave interacts with the polymer dissolved into the solvent. INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo apresenta as bases do conceito de Governana gil em TIC ? Tecnologia da Informao e Comunicao - , baseado nos princpios e valores das Metodologias geis da Engenharia de Software. O desenvolvimento deste trabalho se deu atravs de um processo de Reviso Sistemtica, apoiado em tcnicas e mtodos Bibliomtricos e Cienciomtricos, no qual foram analisados os Fatores Crticos de Sucesso (FCS) de projetos de Governana em TIC e os princpios das Metodologias geis. Em seguida, atravs de uma abordagem indutiva, com foco na convergncia entre os conceitos envolvidos, analisou-se como os princpios geis poderiam contribuir para minimizar o hiato existente entre a TIC e o negcio. Evidncias da coerncia da proposta foram reforadas atravs de uma Pesquisa de Sondagem Conceitual. Como resultado, foram definidas as bases em que se fundamentam o conceito de Governana gil em TIC e sugerido como trabalho futuro a definio de um modelo de referncia para este conceito.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents the basis of the Agile Governance in Information and Communication Technology (ICT), which is based on Agile Software Engineering Methodologies principles and values. Its development was done through a systematic review process, supported by Bibliometrics and Scientometrics methods and techniques, where the Critical Success Factors (CSF) of ICT Governance projects and the principles of the Agile Manifesto were analyzed. Next, through an inductive approach, focused on the convergence between the concepts involved, it was analyzed how agile principles could help to minimize the gap between ICT and business. Evidences of their occurrence were taken through a Conceptual Survey Research. As a result, the foundations and concepts of Agile Governance in ICT were defined and, finally, the development of a reference model was proposed as a future work.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo apresenta um estudo de caso completo de Desenvolvimento Distribudo de Software, apoiado na metodologia gil SCRUM. Este estudo de caso foi realizado atravs da constituio de uma Fbrica de Software para o desenvolvimento de uma Biblioteca Multimdia, um sistema para o compartilhamento de objetos de aprendizagem utilizados pelos projetos de telemedicina e telessade do Ncleo de Telesade da UFPE.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents a complete study case of a Distributed Software Development, supported by the SCRUM agile methodology. This study case was conducted by setting up a Software Factory to develop a Multimedia Library, a system for sharing learning objects used by the telemedicine and telehealth projects of the Center of Telehealth at UFPE.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo tem por objetivo apresentar uma reviso sistemtica a respeito de nove modelos de governana em TIC, procurando permitir ao leitor a criao de uma viso crtica a respeito do corpo de conhecimento de governana em TIC ? ICTGBOK, suas principais caractersticas, carncias e limitaes. Ao final identifica o surgimento de um novo paradigma: Governana gil em TIC, que se prope a sanar as limitaes existentes.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper aims to present a systematic review on nine models of governance in ICT, seeking to allow the reader to create a critical view about the body of knowledge in ICT governance - ICTGBOK, its main characteristics, needs and limitations. At the end identifies the emergence of a new paradigm: Agile Governance in ICT, it is proposed to remedy existing constraints.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Project Management according to the PMBOK - An Overview

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Alexandre Jos Henrique de Oliveira Luna
AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: Alexandre J. H. de O. Luna

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Atividades profissionais, cientficas e tcnicas
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Informao e comunicao

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo tem por objetivo apresentar a necessidade de pensar em cada iniciativa organizacional como um projeto e salientar os benefcios de sua efetiva gesto. Tambm ser discorrido sobre algumas definies de gesto de projetos, providas por profissionais de renome. Por fim, apresentada uma viso geral do PMBOK (Project Management Body of Knowledge), abordando as nove reas do conhecimento, os cinco grupos de processo e seus quarenta e quatro processos.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper aims to present the need to think of each project as an organizational initiative and highlight the benefits of their effective management. Also will discoursed on some definitions of project management, provided by renowned professionals. Finally, we present an overview of the PMBOK (Project Management Body of Knowledge), addressing the nine knowledge areas, five process groups and their forty-four process.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Modelos de Maturidade na Gesto de Projetos

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Alexandre Jos Henrique de Oliveira Luna

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Atividades profissionais, cientficas e tcnicas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Neste artigo veremos o funcionamento dos principais modelos de maturidade em gerenciamento de projetos, alm de uma anlise comparativa, onde sero abordados aspectos como semelhanas, pontos fortes e limitaes. A exigncia de melhoria contnua dos projetos faz com que o gerenciamento da maturidade dos projetos de uma empresa seja efetivamente implantado. Entretanto, tentar atropelar e forar os limites da organizao pode trazer grandes prejuzos. Assim, a melhor estratgia adotar uma poltica passo a passo, descobrindo inicialmente o nvel de maturidade da empresa, criando definies claras para os envolvidos no projeto e realizando um monitoramento do desempenho geral dos projetos, de modo a ter uma viso global de como se estava antes e a nova realidade.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In this article we look at the functioning of the main models of maturity in project management, and a comparative analysis, which will be addressed issues such as similarities, strengths and limitations. The requirement for continuous improvement project makes the project management maturity of a company is effectively implemented. However, trying to trample and push the boundaries of the organization can bring great losses. So the best strategy is to adopt a policy step by step, first discovering the level of maturity of the company, creating clear definitions for those involved in the project and conducting a performance monitoring overall project in order to have an overview of how to was before and the new reality.

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: International Journal of Computer Science and Information Technology (Print)

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Alexandre Jos Henrique de Oliveira Luna

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Administrao pblica, defesa e seguridade social
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Pesquisa e desenvolvimento cientfico

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Context: Agility at the business level requires Information Technology (IT) environment flexible and customizable, as well as effective and responsive governance in order to deliver value faster, better, and cheaper to the business. Objective: To understand better this context, our paper seeks to investigate how the domain of agile governance has evolved, as well as to derive implications for research and practice. Method: We conducted a systematic review about the state of art of the agile governance up to and including 2013. Our search strategy identified 1992 studies in 10 databases, of which 167 had the potential to answer our research questions. Results: We organized the studies into four major groups: software engineering, enterprise, manufacturing and multidisciplinary; classifying them into 16 emerging categories. As a result, the review provides a convergent definition for agile governance, six meta- principles, and a map of findings organized by topic and classified by relevance and convergence. Conclusion: The found evidence lead us to believe that agile governance is a relatively new, wide and multidisciplinary area focused on organizational performance and competitiveness that needs to be more intensively studied. Finally, we made improvements and additions to the methodological approach for systematic reviews and qualitative studies.

As a result, the review provides a convergent definition for agile governance, six meta- principles, and a map of findings organized by topic and classified by relevance and convergence. Conclusion: The found evidence lead us to believe that agile governance is a relatively new, wide and multidisciplinary area focused on organizational performance and competitiveness that needs to be more intensively studied. Finally, we made improvements and additions to the methodological approach for systematic reviews and qualitative studies.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Context: In recent years, companies have undergone a renewal of management strategies while searching for space in the market. The involvement of these companies in developing innovative software projects as a form of differentiation in products and services is common. Innovative projects are uncertain by nature, since the behaviour and evolution of the market and technological development may not be predicted. There is a natural relation between software projects that have an innovation degree and uncertainties. Objective: The aim of this paper is to discuss some aspects related to uncertainty management to understand the recommendations that positively influence project management in the face of uncertainties and the method of using the knowledge acquired during this study to provide strategic orientations that can be used by the industry to improve organizations' performance and their projects. Method: This study was built on evidence-based software engineering and provides subsidy for the need to address uncertainty in software projects in order to reduce the negative impacts caused by them. In this article, the interviews' results and focus group conducted with project managers and project management researchers are presented. The interviews and focus group aimed to assess the previous concepts as well as the new practical ones. Results: During the interviews, the concept of early signs was designed and associated with the management of software project uncertainties. In addition, project managers became aware of the mindfulness concept and its use for observing projects' uncertainties in order to ensure its success. Based on information collected from managers and literature review, a series of recommendations were drawn. Furthermore, the recommendations were evaluated by a focus group. Finally, a series of recommendations were designed in order to help the software project managers. Conclusion: This study contributes to software project management by developi

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Uma abordagem para o Gerenciamento Estratgico gil em Sade utilizando PES, OKR e MAnGve
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: An Approach to Agile Strategic Health Management using PES, OKR and MAnGve

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: Luna, Alexandre J. H. de O.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Administrao pblica, defesa e seguridade social
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Atividades de ateno sade humana

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Contexto: Considerando a necessidade de estabelecer um processo de planejamento estratgico que tenha mecanismos de monitoramento para a construo de uma cultura organizacional baseada em resultados. Objetivo: Prope-se uma abordagem gil para o gerenciamento estratgico e seu monitoramento, atravs da combinao de Planejamento Estratgico Situacional ? PES, Objective Key Results - OKR e MAnGve. Mtodo: Atravs (1) de uma reviso exploratria da literatura, e por meio da (2) anlise das lies aprendidas durante a execuo do planejamento estratgico em relao ao ltimo binio: identificamos pontos de melhoria para a abordagem originalmente adotada. Resultado: Como resultado, obtivemos uma estrutura hbrida combinando PES, OKR e MAnGve, que podem ser adotadas como ponto de partida para outras instituies que desejam obter melhores resultados de seu planejamento estratgico. Concluso: A abordagem combinada, resultante deste trabalho, denota bom potencial de uso, e pode ser uma alternativa para instituies que vivenciem os mesmos problemas, contribuindo para que os seus profissionais e executivos possam melhorar as suas prticas de governana institucional.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Context: Considering the need to establish strategic planning that has monitoring mechanisms for the construction of an organizational culture based on results. Objective: We are proposing an agile approach to strategic management and its monitoring, through the combination of Situational Strategic Planning ? PES, MAnGve, and OKR - Objective Key Results. Method: Through (1) an exploratory literature review, and by means of (2) an analysis of the lessons learned during the strategic planning execution related to the last biennium: we have identified points of improvement to the approach originally adopted. Result: As a result, we have obtained a hybrid framework combining PES, OKR, and MAnGve, which can be adopted as a starting point for other institutions that wish get better results from their strategic planning. Conclusion: This approach needs to be applied, tested and refined in other organizations to help practitioners and executives to establish useful strategic management tools for decision making.

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: INNOVATIONS IN SYSTEMS AND SOFTWARE ENGINEERING (PRINT)

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: Luna, Alexandre J. H. de O.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Servios de escritrio, de apoio administrativo e outros servios prestados s empresas
SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-3: Atividades dos servios de tecnologia da informao

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Agile governance has emerged as a relatively new, wide, and multidisciplinary area focused on organizational performance and competitiveness, which until recently had lacked in-depth exploration. Aiming to reduce this gap, we recently proposed the Agile Governance Theory to analyze and describe its phenomena, and provide a better understanding of how agility in business can establish effective and responsive governance. This paper describes the process of transposing the theory from a conceptual framework to the real world and developing the necessary measurement elements to test it. We operationalize the emerging theory according to the four remaining steps of part two of Dubin?s method: identifying its propositions, deriving empirical indicators from its constructs, and establishing testable hypotheses. We operationalized the emerging theory by: (1) depicting eight theoretical scenarios that help characterize and describe organizational contexts in the real world, (2) recognizing 11 propositions that allow us to predict the behavior of its elements, (3) identifying 24 empirical indicators to measure its constructs, and (4) developing 16 hypotheses to test the theory as a further study. We operationalize the theory to allow real-world empirical testing based on this work, as further study is necessary to assess the theory?s plausibility. We also make improvements and additions to the methodological approach for theory-building research (including Dubin?s Method), extending it to a multimethod approach.

Agile governance has emerged as a relatively new, wide, and multidisciplinary area focused on organizational performance and competitiveness, which until recently had lacked in-depth exploration. Aiming to reduce this gap, we recently proposed the Agile Governance Theory to analyze and describe its phenomena, and provide a better understanding of how agility in business can establish effective and responsive governance. This paper describes the process of transposing the theory from a conceptual framework to the real world and developing the necessary measurement elements to test it. We operationalize the emerging theory according to the four remaining steps of part two of Dubin?s method: identifying its propositions, deriving empirical indicators from its constructs, and establishing testable hypotheses. We operationalized the emerging theory by: (1) depicting eight theoretical scenarios that help characterize and describe organizational contexts in the real world, (2) recognizing 11 propositions that allow us to predict the behavior of its elements, (3) identifying 24 empirical indicators to measure its constructs, and (4) developing 16 hypotheses to test the theory as a further study. We operationalize the theory to allow real-world empirical testing based on this work, as further study is necessary to assess the theory?s plausibility. We also make improvements and additions to the methodological approach for theory-building research (including Dubin?s Method), extending it to a multimethod approach.
-------

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Considerando a necessidade de estabelecer um processo de planejamento estratgico que tenha mecanismos de monitoramento para a construo de uma cultura organizacional baseada em resultados. Objetivo: Prope-se uma abordagem gil para o gerenciamento estratgico e seu monitoramento, atravs da combinao de Planejamento Estratgico Situacional ? PES, Objective Key Results - OKR e MAnGve. Mtodo: Atravs (1) de uma reviso exploratria da literatura, e por meio da (2) anlise das lies aprendidas durante a execuo do planejamento estratgico em relao ao ltimo binio: identificamos pontos de melhoria para a abordagem originalmente adotada. Resultado: Como resultado, obtivemos uma estrutura hbrida combinando PES, OKR e MAnGve, que podem ser adotadas como ponto de partida para outras instituies que desejam obter melhores resultados de seu planejamento estratgico. Concluso: A abordagem combinada, resultante deste trabalho, denota bom potencial de uso, e pode ser uma alternativa para instituies que vivenciem os mesmos problemas, contribuindo para que os seus profissionais e executivos possam melhorar as suas prticas de governana institucional.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A Governana gil uma rea relativamente nova, ampla e multidisciplinar, focada no desempenho organizacional e na competitividade, que precisa ser mais intensamente estudada. Nos ltimos anos o conceito de governana gil est ganhando ateno e evoluindo ao longo do tempo como um significado que faz cada vez mais sentido em diferentes contextos, sejam eles pblicos ou privados. A natureza sociotcnica da governana gil fica patente quando lidamos com a compreenso das intersees entre aspectos tcnicos e sociais: considerando as pessoas como agentes de mudana nas organizaes, em contextos onde a tecnologia um elemento-chave. Recente estudo desenvolvido por Luna (2015) identificaram que a fora das evidncias encontradas em relao ao estado da arte da governana gil ainda baixa. Este artigo visa, dar uma viso geral sobre a recente evoluo deste tpico de pesquisa e incentivar pesquisadores e praticantes a desenvolverem novos estudos a fim de contribuir na evoluo deste campo de estudo nascente, carente de estudos.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Agile Governance is a relatively new, broad, and multidisciplinary area, focused on organizational performance and competitiveness, which needs to be studied more intensively. In recent years, the concept of agile governance is gaining attention and evolving over time as a meaning that makes more and more sense in different contexts, whether public or private. The sociotechnical nature of agile governance is evident when we deal with understanding the intersections between technical and social aspects: considering people as agents of change in organizations, in contexts where technology is a key element. A recent study developed by Luna (2015) identified that the strength of the evidence found in relation to the state of the art of agile governance is still low. This article aims to provide an overview of the recent evolution of this research topic and to encourage researchers and practitioners to develop new studies in order to contribute to the evolution of this nascent field of study, in need of studies.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: In 2016, fundamental principles and behavioral guidelines were introduced to support the implementation of agile governance. This paper explores the evolution of Agile Governance and how these principles can enhance its implementation. We critically review the Agile Governance Manifesto and compare it with perceptions and factual information by examining our research and practice for fifteen years. The study provides a grounded understanding of the topic and presents an agenda with 12 emerging research and practice topics in agile governance. A framework is also proposed to organize these topics into two central lines, guiding future research and practice.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The Covid-19 pandemic provoked a reevaluation of teacher-student dynamics, prompting the adoption of innovative approaches to ensure student engagement, participation, academic performance, and retention. To effectively address the emerging challenges in this context, mixed methods research was conducted, anchored by the Design Science Research approach, where artifacts were developed, evaluated, and systematized in a collaborative serious game, MASTER-PM. The findings demonstrated the game's positive impact on teamwork learning outcomes, and valuable student feedback facilitated iterative enhancements to the game and its support artifacts. This paper describes the MASTER-PM application in an undergraduate administration course at a Brazilian University and evaluates its viability and usefulness in project management education.

This paper describes the MASTER-PM application in an undergraduate administration course at a Brazilian University and evaluates its viability and usefulness in project management education.

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Alexandre Jos Henrique de Oliveira Luna
AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: LUNA, ALEXANDRE JOS HENRIQUE DE OLIVEIRA

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Servios de escritrio, de apoio administrativo e outros servios prestados s empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Context: Agile Governance Theory (AGT) has emerged as a potential model for organizational chains of responsibility across business units and teams. Objective: This study aims to assess how AGT is reflected in practice. Method: AGT was operationalized down into 16 testable hypotheses. All hypotheses were tested by arranging eight theoretical scenarios with 118 practitioners from 86 organizations and 19 countries who completed an in-depth explanatory scenario-based survey. The feedback results were analyzed using Structural Equation Modeling (SEM) and Confirmatory Factor Analysis (CFA). Results: The analyses supported key theory components and hypotheses, such as mediation between agile capabilities and business operations, through governance capabilities. Conclusion: This study supports the theory and suggests that AGT can assist teams in gaining a better understanding of their organization?s governance in an agile context. A better understanding can help remove delays and misunderstandings that can come about with unclear decision-making channels, which can jeopardize the fulfillment of the overall strategy.

Conclusion: This study supports the theory and suggests that AGT can assist teams in gaining a better understanding of their organization?s governance in an agile context. INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Iniciei minha paixo pelas letras aos 15 anos, e as escrevi continuamente at os 23 anos de idade. Deste perodo tenho escrito ainda algumas msicas, crnicas, contos e outras tantas poesias, que ainda pretendo publicar. Este livro resultado de uma coletnea parcial das poesias produzidas no incio de minha juventude. Espero que seja uma agradvel jornada para o leitor. Acredito que, mesmo quem no um aficionado poemas, ter bons momentos de divertimento e reflexo.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: I started my passion for writing at the age of 15 and wrote it continuously until I was 23 years old. From this period I have written some songs, chronicles, short stories, and other poems, which I still intend to publish. This book is the result of a partial collection of poetry produced early in my youth. I hope it is a pleasant journey for the reader. I believe that even those who are not poems lover will have good moments of amusement and reflection.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O MAnGve (pronuncia-se mangue) um framework para implantao e melhoria dos processos de governana e gerenciamento dos servios de TIC nas organizaes. Atravs de uma abordagem gil, com foco prtico e orientaes que procuram superar as principais carncias e limitaes na aplicao dos modelos existentes (ITIL, COBIT, COSO, VAL IT, dentre outros): a proposta deste livro dar ao leitor um guia prtico para implantao e melhoria de Governana em TIC.
	Esta uma abordagem inovadora e recente sobre a aplicao de princpios, valores e boas prticas das metodologias geis da Engenharia de Software na rea de Governana e Gesto. Este modelo "incorpora", como mecanismos para o alcance de seus objetivos, tambm um conjunto de metforas e analogias a respeito de "meio ambiente e desenvolvimento sustentvel", alm de uma srie de atributos ldicos da "cultura Manguebeat". 
	Este livro apresenta uma viso crtica sobre as principais limitaes prticas encontradas em oito modelos relacionados Governana, os fundamentos da Governana gil, assim como todo o corpo de conhecimento do MAnGve. Outro ponto que merece destaque a descrio detalhada da aplicao do MAnGve atravs de um caso prtico numa organizao real, onde so explorados: as principais dificuldades e limitaes, as lies aprendidas, assim como os resultados alcanados. A reflexo em cima destas questes trabalhada com o intuito de levar o leitor a um conjunto de recomendaes por onde iniciar a implementao de governana em sua organizao.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The MAnGve is a framework for implementation and improvement of governance processes and management of ICT services in organizations/enterprises. Through an agile approach, focused and practical guidelines that seek to overcome the main deficiencies in the application and limitations of existing models (ITIL, COBIT, COSO, VAL IT, among others): The purpose of this book is to give the reader a practical guide implementation and improvement of ICT Governance.
This is a recent and innovative approach on the application of principles, values ​​and practices of agile software engineering in the area of ​​Governance and Management. This model "incorporates" as mechanisms for achieving their goals, also a set of metaphors and analogies about "the environment and sustainable development", plus a host of recreational attributes of the "culture Manguebeat."
This book presents a critical view of the main practical limitations found in eight models related to governance, the fundamentals of Agile Governance, as well as the whole body of knowledge MAnGve. Another point worth mentioning is the detailed description of the application of MAnGve through a case study in a real organization, which are explored: the main difficulties and constraints, lessons learned, and the results achieved. The reflection upon these issues is worked in order to lead the reader to a set of recommendations where to begin implementation of governance in your organization.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O objetivo deste captulo apresentar os principais conceitos de governana em TIC ? Information Technology Infrastructure Library e COBIT - Control Objectives for Information and related Technology, alm de conceituar alguns outros menos difundidos para ampliao dos horizontes do leitor. So apresentados os conceitos mais importantes da Gesto em TIC, os modelos existentes nesta rea, as iniciativas de integrao dos principais modelos e como se d a implantao de modelos de gesto.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The purpose of this chapter is to present the main concepts of governance in ICT - Information and Communication and the evolution and origins, as well as present the most widely used models in this area, emphasizing models ITIL - Information Technology Infrastructure Library and COBIT - Control Objectives for Information and related Technology, and conceptualize some other less widespread to expand the horizons of the reader. We present the most important concepts in management of ICT, the models in this area, the integration initiatives of the main models and how is the implementation of management models.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Context: Competitiveness is the key to a sustainable development and it demands agility at the business and organizational levels, which in turn requires a flexible and customizable IT environment and effective and responsive governance in order to deliver value to the business. Objective: This paper describes the conceptual development of a theory to analyzing and describe agile governance in order to increase the success rate of their practice, achieving organizational performance and business competitiveness. Method: We adopt a multi-method research, framing the theory?s conceptual development using Dubin's method of theory building. Results: We have developed a conceptual framework of the theory encompassing its constructs, laws of interaction, boundaries and system states. Conclusion: This theory can provide a better understanding of the essence of agile governance, by mapping of its constructs, mediators, moderators and disturbing factors, in order to help organizations reach better results.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Context: Competitiveness is the key to a sustainable development and it demands agility at the business and organizational levels, which in turn requires a flexible and customizable IT environment and effective and responsive governance in order to deliver value to the business. Objective: This paper describes the conceptual development of a theory to analyzing and describe agile governance in order to increase the success rate of their practice, achieving organizational performance and business competitiveness. Method: We adopt a multi-method research, framing the theory?s conceptual development using Dubin's method of theory building. Results: We have developed a conceptual framework of the theory encompassing its constructs, laws of interaction, boundaries and system states. Conclusion: This theory can provide a better understanding of the essence of agile governance, by mapping of its constructs, mediators, moderators and disturbing factors, in order to help organizations reach better results.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O captulo "Agilidade Inovativa" explora a interseo entre agilidade e inovao, destacando a importncia de uma abordagem dinmica e proativa para responder aos desafios do ambiente organizacional contemporneo. Diferente da simples aplicao de metodologias geis, a agilidade inovativa apresentada como uma capacidade organizacional essencial para antecipar tendncias, adaptar-se rapidamente s mudanas e liderar processos de inovao.
O texto discute como a inovao no um evento isolado, mas um processo contnuo que requer estruturas flexveis e experimentao constante. A governana gil destacada como um fator crucial para direcionar essa agilidade de forma estratgica e sustentvel. O captulo tambm introduz o MAnGve-i9 (Mi9), um framework desenvolvido para apoiar a governana e gesto da inovao em ecossistemas de Cincia, Tecnologia e Inovao (CT&I). O Mi9 adota ciclos iterativos e incrementais, alinhando prticas geis s necessidades estratgicas das organizaes.
Por fim, enfatiza-se que a agilidade inovativa essencial para transformar desafios em oportunidades, garantindo a relevncia e o crescimento sustentvel das organizaes diante da volatilidade e incerteza do cenrio global​.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The chapter "Innovative Agility" explores the intersection between agility and innovation, emphasizing the importance of a dynamic and proactive approach to addressing the challenges of the contemporary organizational environment. Unlike the mere application of agile methodologies, innovative agility is presented as an essential organizational capability to anticipate trends, rapidly adapt to change, and lead innovation processes.

The text discusses how innovation is not an isolated event but a continuous process that requires flexible structures and constant experimentation. Agile governance is highlighted as a crucial factor in strategically and sustainably guiding this agility. The chapter also introduces MAnGve-i9 (Mi9), a framework designed to support the governance and management of innovation in Science, Technology, and Innovation (ST&I) ecosystems. Mi9 adopts iterative and incremental cycles, aligning agile practices with the strategic needs of organizations.

Finally, the chapter emphasizes that innovative agility is key to transforming challenges into opportunities, ensuring the relevance and sustainable growth of organizations amid the volatility and uncertainty of the global landscape.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
MASTER-PM um serious game, desenvolvido pelo Agile Governance Research Lab (AGRLab) sediado no Departamento de Cincias Administrativas (DCA), do Centro de Cincias Sociais Aplicadas (CCSA), da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (DCA-UFPE), sob a coordenao do Professor Alexandre Luna.

O MASTER-PM visa contribuir na aprendizagem em Governana e Gerenciamento de Projetos a partir da simulao de situaes que procuram auxiliar profissionais em formao e/ou praticantes da rea, a desenvolver ou aperfeioar competncias tcnicas e comportamentais necessrias para reduzir disparidade persistente entre o talento disponvel e a crescente demanda por habilidades em gerenciamento de projetos nos diversos setores da economia.

Esta iniciativa foi parcialmente financiada por meio do Edital 16/2021 - Auxlio a Projetos de Pesquisa para Jovens Pesquisadores ? APQ-JP, da Fundao de Apoio Pesquisa de Pernambuco (FACEPE), e do Edital n 19/2022 ? Estmulo Inovao no mbito de Prticas de Ensino na Graduao da DIFI/PROGRAD-UFPE.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
MASTER-PM is a serious game developed by the Agile Governance Research Lab (AGRLab) based at the Department of Administrative Sciences (DCA), at the Center for Applied Social Sciences (CCSA), at the Federal University of Pernambuco (DCA-UFPE), under the coordination of Professor Alexandre Luna.

The MASTER-PM aims to contribute to learning in Governance and Project Management from the simulation of situations that seek to help professionals in training and practitioners in the area to develop or improve technical and behavioral skills necessary to reduce the persistent disparity between talent availability and the growing demand for project management skills in different sectors of the economy.

This initiative was partially funded through Public Notice 16/2021 - Aid to Research Projects for Young Researchers ? APQ-JP, from the Pernambuco Research Support Foundation (FACEPE), and Public Notice No. 19/2022 ? Stimulus to Innovation in Scope of Teaching Practices in Graduation at DIFI/PROGRAD-UFPE.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
MASTER-PM vU1 3D um Business Simulation Game (BSG) para aprendizagem ativa em governana e gerenciamento de projetos. 

Esta verso mais imersiva uma evoluo da verso MASTER-PM vC3, serious game originalmente desenvolvido usando o conceito de Minimum Viable Product (MVP): uma verso do BSG que permitiu ao time de pesquisa coletar o mximo de aprendizado validado sobre o pblico-alvo com o mnimo de esforo. 

Ambas as verses foram desenvolvidas pelo Agile Governance Research Lab (AGRLab) sediado no Departamento de Cincias Administrativas (DCA), do Centro de Cincias Sociais Aplicadas (CCSA), da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (DCA-UFPE), sob a coordenao do Professor Alexandre Luna.

O MASTER-PM visa contribuir na aprendizagem em Governana e Gerenciamento de Projetos a partir da simulao de situaes que procuram auxiliar profissionais em formao e/ou praticantes da rea, a desenvolver ou aperfeioar competncias tcnicas e comportamentais necessrias para reduzir disparidade persistente entre o talento disponvel e a crescente demanda por habilidades em gerenciamento de projetos nos diversos setores da economia.

O BSG parte do ponto de vista de um trainee (player) no seu primeiro dia de trabalho na empresa fictcia Omnia. Onde o player (treinando: estudante ou praticante) precisa tomar decises importantes no contexto de seu trabalho e desenvolver competncias tcnicas e comportamentais essenciais para evoluir em sua carreira na organizao. O trainee pode desenvolver competncias com a ajuda do jogo por meio das misses e interaes com o mundo do jogo (objetos e personagens ? NPCs), recebendo feedback do progresso do desenvolvimento das competncias exploradas em cada cenrio de aprendizagem.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
MASTER-PM vU1 3D is a Business Simulation Game (BSG) for active learning in governance and project management.

This more immersive version is an evolution of the MASTER-PM vC3 version, a serious game originally developed using the Minimum Viable Product (MVP) concept: a version of BSG that allowed the research team to collect as much validated learning about the audience as possible with minimal effort.

Both versions were developed by the Agile Governance Research Lab (AGRLab) based in the Department of Administrative Sciences (DCA) of the Center for Applied Social Sciences (CCSA) of the Federal University of Pernambuco (DCA-UFPE) under the coordination of Professor Alexandre Luna.

MASTER-PM aims to contribute to learning in Governance and Project Management through the simulation of situations that seek to help professionals in training or practitioners in the area to develop or improve technical and behavioral skills necessary to reduce the persistent disparity between talent available and the growing demand for project management skills in different sectors of the economy.

BSG starts from the point of view of a trainee (player) on his first day of work at the fictional company Omnia. Where the player (training: student or practitioner) needs to make important decisions in the context of their work and develop essential technical and behavioral competencies to progress in their career in the organization, the trainee can develop competencies with the help of the game through missions and interactions with the game world (objects and characters ? NPCs), receiving feedback on the progress of developing the skills explored in each learning scenario.
